video_prompt:
**Focusing on implied user interaction and its consequences:**

A user attempts to upload content, resulting in a sudden, prominent "403 Forbidden" display. Text then appears explaining "Registration is required to upload adult content." The screen remains static after this final text appears.
image_prompt: Generate a black screen with white text. At the top, "FREE IMAGE HOST" appears. Below it, a large "403" is centered. Beneath the "403," it reads: "Registration is required to upload adult content."
refined_video_prompt: A visual response to an implied user interaction triggers. A prominent "403 Forbidden" error abruptly flashes into view, displacing previous content. Immediately after, an explanatory text gently appears beneath it, outlining the registration requirement as the final on-screen alteration.
